body.name: Portable Travel Washing Machine, 10L Portable Mini Washer Machine, Foldable Underwear Washing Machine with Spin Dryer, Small Portable Washer and Dryer Combo for Apartments, Camping, Travel.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 49 mins
features: 【Portable Washer and Dryer Combo】- Our portable washing machine is integrated with washing and drying, multipurpose, small in size, fully functional. Ideal for cleaning lightweight clothing that requires separate cleaning, such as baby clothing, underwear, towels, socks, or other small items.

【Foldable Washing Machine】 - Our mini washing machine adopts a foldable design, press down folding, lightweight, easy to move, easy to store in a small space, ideal for camping, vacation, business travel, apartments, dormitories, and won't take up too much space. Unfolded dimensions are 11.8 x 11.8 x 11 inches and folded dimensions are 11.8 x 11.8 x 5.5 inches.

【3 Modes & Easy to Use】 - Our portable washer offers 3 modes - 5-minute quick wash, 10-minute deep wash, and 2-minute spin-dry. With a one-button design, simply long press the power button for 2 seconds to start or stop, and lightly touch the button to select your preferred mode.
【Removable Spin-dry Basket】 - After Washing Clothes, easily install the draining basket and use it with the washing machine's spin-dry mode to automatically separate residual water from clothes.
【10L Large Capacity】 - Our small washing machine has a spacious 10L capacity, allowing it to easily hold 12 pairs of socks, 6 towels, and 6 pairs of underpants.

【High Power & Efficient Cleaning】 - Equipped with high power and sufficient torque, our Mini Washer machine utilizes high-speed water flow generated by the wave wheel to simulate the tumbling and kneading action of human hands. This ensures effective stain removal and gentle care for clothing fibers.
【Upgrade Durable Material】 - Our portable washer and spin dryer are made of upgraded TRP material, which is more resistant to aging, yellowing, high temperature, and corrosion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Portable Laundry Machines Can Help You with These Laundry Scenarios Socks piled up, no time to wash themBaby clothes that need to be washed separatelyHouse space is too small and the environment does not allowUnderwear and underpants that you don't want to hand wash

Save space: Folding design can save storage space.Save time: It only takes about 10 minutes to wash the items.Low noise: Low noise won't disturb your work and sleep.Easy to use: Just one touching button to control the portable washing machine.Portable handle: With portable handle, easy to use during travel or any occasion.Blue light sterilization: Suitable for washing underwear or baby clothes, ensure the health of your family.Anti-slip suction cups: Four powerful anti-slip suction cups make the washer more stable during washing.

Removable Drainage Basket Automatically separate residual moisture from laundry, gently drain to avoid pulling and deforming laundry. Upgrade Concealed Drains Upgraded drain does not take up extra space, no need to manually pour water, automatic drainage after washing. High Power Motor High torque, fast speed, driving the washing rhythm of the wave wheel, more powerful cleaning, stubborn stains without residue.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS Washing Time 5 MINS / 10MINS Spin-dry Time 3 MINS Rated Voltage 110V-220V Rated Power 30W Capacity 10L Weight 5LBS Folded Size 11.8 * 11.8 * 5.5 Inches Unfolded Size 11.8 * 11.8 * 11 Inches
Package Includes: 1*Portable Washer Machine1 * Washer Adapter1 * Drain Basket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I can’t wait to take this camping!! It’s gunna be perfect!! If you’re always on the go for business/work etc or love camping or anything like that this is perfect to take with you!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Simply does not work.
reviews.reviewText: Simply does not work.It's missing any sort of plug or valve to keep water in the bucket (no mention of this in instructions either) so it starts draining the moment you add water. Motor is incredibly weak. A single T-shirt was enough to make it strain. Might work better with a full bucket of water but it's basically a big rubber bucket with a hole in it. Honestly there is no way this was ever 'tested' and successfully used before shipping this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay , so I've been looking at these for a while and I've finally got it. It's not bad. I can do my personal items. No problem. I did put in three pair of leggings as well it did great Only thing is the spin as far as getting the excess water that does not work. Also, the hose already got a hole in it. Soh, be careful where you place it. You're gonna have a mess but for the price not bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Travel Essential!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the Portable Travel Washing Machine, and it has been a game-changer for my travel and camping adventures. This 10L portable mini washer machine is not only compact and lightweight but also incredibly efficient.The foldable design is perfect for packing into tight spaces, making it an ideal companion for apartments, camping trips, and travel. The spin dryer feature is a lifesaver, ensuring that my clothes are ready to wear in no time, even when I'm on the go.I appreciate the convenience this small portable washer and dryer combo brings to my travels. It's easy to use, and the results are impressive. Say goodbye to laundry worries during your trips with this fantastic portable washing machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and compact
reviews.reviewText: This washer was a bit smaller than expected but still very useful for baby clothes and intimates like dress socks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: When it is cleaning, it is so loud and not strong enough to wash more than one piece of clothe per wash. Also, the spinning mode doesn't work either, because the motor is not powerful enough.
